definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: From now on, we need to be more mobile and flexible, carefully choosing battle opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 今後，我們要更加機動靈活，精細地尋求。

sentences.english: This method is mainly applied for autonomous mobile vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法主要應用於自主式機動飛行器。

sentences.english: This kind of fast, bloody raid is something the Reapers really excel at.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的快速機動使得“收割者”非常擅長搜索。

sentences.english: This article introduces the Data Collecting System in the Multi-function Car for Test and Inspection of Vehicles in Specific Sites and Area.
sentences.chinese: 介紹廠內機動車輛綜合檢測車的數據檢測採集系統。

sentences.english: Full use of all non-motorised water sports and all associated equipment.
sentences.chinese: 充分利用所有非機動水上運動和所有相關設備。

sentences.english: Suggest complete five-day-per-week mobility — the boss will go for it.
sentences.chinese: 建議每週有五天機動日，老闆會同意的。

sentences.english: Pin connected main frame, short turning radius, flexible mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 鉸接式車架，轉彎半徑小，機動靈活。

sentences.english: A motor vehicle which reaches the standards for being discarded as unserviceable shall not run on road.
sentences.chinese: 達到報廢標準的機動車不得上道路行駛。

sentences.english: Policing tactic is an important component in arresting action.
sentences.chinese: 警察戰術機動是緝捕行動的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: We are flexible at all times to meet and exceed customers' needs.
sentences.chinese: 我們總能夠靈活機動以保證滿足客戶的需求。

sentences.english: Set of bollards for blocking vehicle access.
sentences.chinese: 阻止機動車通行的一組安全島護柱。

sentences.english: Don't you smell the gas from the motors all around the streets?
sentences.chinese: 難道你沒有在街上聞到從機動車上排出來的氣體嗎？

sentences.english: Nowadays, with mechanization, machines are replacing miners to dig the coal.
sentences.chinese: 如今，隨着機動化水平的提高，機器替代了人力挖煤。

sentences.english: Any other vehicle on which exemption is granted on the approval of the Provincial TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 經省交通徵費稽查機構覈准免徵的其他機動車。

sentences.english: Cars will be restricted based on the odd and even number rule for 46 days, starting today.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，有46天將實行機動車單雙號限行。

sentences.english: The motor and garage trades will be harmed.
sentences.chinese: 機動車買賣和車輛修理業也將受損。

definition: to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to dispatch (vehicles, staff etc)/to schedule/to manage/dispatcher/scheduler
preparedness/to bring sth to a state of readiness
disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
